text: 5.10: Sav 12.14; Ro 2.16; 14.10; Ga 6.7; Kor 3.24-25; VB 22.12Ne khaŋ muuŋgi. Nza za kaŋgi, nza zam Krais nɨma thivgirim, ana nza kha nuianan ki fhavi khɨga kav muuŋgi tɨvi ga suaŋv nza suaŋv suaŋgirga. Nza ntigem ŋam kɨv, nza tɨvir vhuuin muuŋgirga o, nza tɨvi mbatɨgir muuŋgirga. Nza zam, nza mba muuŋgi tɨvi, nza bevbevira ntan vheza ndigirga.
